verses.verse: Now there was<WH1961> a man<WH376> of Benjamin,<WH4480> <WH1144> whose name<WH8034> was Kish,<WH7027> the son<WH1121> of Abiel,<WH22> the son<WH1121> of Zeror,<WH6872> the son<WH1121> of Bechorath,<WH1064> the son<WH1121> of Aphiah,<WH647> a Benjamite,<WH1145> a mighty man<WH1368> of power.<WH2428>

And he had<WH1961> a son,<WH1121> whose name<WH8034> was Saul,<WH7586> a choice young man,<WH970> and a goodly:<WH2896> and there was not<WH369> among the children<WH4480> <WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> a goodlier<WH2896> person<WH376> than<WH4480> he: from his shoulders<WH4480> <WH7926> and upward<WH4605> he was higher<WH1364> than any<WH4480> <WH3605> of the people.<WH5971>

And the asses<WH860> of Kish<WH7027> Saul's<WH7586> father<WH1> were lost.<WH6> And Kish<WH7027> said<WH559> to<WH413> Saul<WH7586> his son,<WH1121> Take<WH3947> now<WH4994> <WH853> one<WH259> of the servants<WH4480> <WH5288> with<WH854> thee, and arise,<WH6965> go<WH1980> seek<WH1245> <WH853> the asses.<WH860>

And he passed through<WH5674> mount<WH2022> Ephraim,<WH669> and passed through<WH5674> the land<WH776> of Shalisha,<WH8031> but they found<WH4672> them not:<WH3808> then they passed through<WH5674> the land<WH776> of Shalim,<WH8171> and there they were not:<WH369> and he passed through<WH5674> the land<WH776> of the Benjamites,<WH1145> but they found<WH4672> them not.<WH3808>

And when they<WH1992> were come<WH935> to the land<WH776> of Zuph,<WH6689> Saul<WH7586> said<WH559> to his servant<WH5288> that<WH834> was with<WH5973> him, Come,<WH1980> and let us return;<WH7725> lest<WH6435> my father<WH1> leave<WH2308> caring for<WH4480> the asses,<WH860> and take thought<WH1672> for us.

And he said<WH559> unto him, Behold<WH2009> now,<WH4994> there is in this<WH2063> city<WH5892> a man<WH376> of God,<WH430> and he is an honorable<WH3513> man;<WH376> all<WH3605> that<WH834> he saith<WH1696> cometh surely to pass:<WH935> <WH935> now<WH4994> let us go<WH1980> thither;<WH8033> peradventure<WH194> he can show<WH5046> us<WH853> our way<WH1870> that<WH834> <WH5921> we should go.<WH1980>

Then said<WH559> Saul<WH7586> to his servant,<WH5288> But, behold,<WH2009> if we go,<WH1980> what<WH4100> shall we bring<WH935> the man?<WH376> for<WH3588> the bread<WH3899> is spent<WH235> in our vessels,<WH4480> <WH3627> and there is not<WH369> a present<WH8670> to bring<WH935> to the man<WH376> of God:<WH430> what<WH4100> have we?

And the servant<WH5288> answered<WH6030> <WH853> Saul<WH7586> again,<WH3254> and said,<WH559> Behold,<WH2009> I have here<WH4672> at hand<WH3027> the fourth part<WH7253> of a shekel<WH8255> of silver:<WH3701> that will I give<WH5414> to the man<WH376> of God,<WH430> to tell<WH5046> us<WH853> our way.<WH1870>

(Formerly <WH6440> in Israel,<WH3478> when a man<WH376> went<WH1980> to inquire<WH1875> of God,<WH430> thus<WH3541> he spoke,<WH559> Come,<WH1980> and let us go<WH1980> to<WH5704> the seer:<WH7200> for<WH3588> he that is now<WH3117> called a Prophet<WH5030> was formerly<WH6440> called<WH7121> a Seer.)<WH7200>

Then said<WH559> Saul<WH7586> to his servant,<WH5288> Well<WH2896> said;<WH1697> come,<WH1980> let us go.<WH1980> So they went<WH1980> unto<WH413> the city<WH5892> where<WH834> <WH8033> the man<WH376> of God<WH430> was.

And as they<WH1992> went up<WH5927> the hill<WH4608> to the city,<WH5892> they<WH1992> found<WH4672> young maidens<WH5291> going out<WH3318> to draw<WH7579> water,<WH4325> and said<WH559> unto them, Is<WH3426> the seer<WH7200> here?<WH2088>

And they answered<WH6030> them, and said,<WH559> He is;<WH3426> behold,<WH2009> he is before<WH6440> you: make haste<WH4116> now,<WH6258> for<WH3588> he came<WH935> today<WH3117> to the city;<WH5892> for<WH3588> there is a sacrifice<WH2077> of the people<WH5971> today<WH3117> in the high place: <WH1116>

As soon as ye be come<WH935> into the city,<WH5892> ye shall straightway<WH3651> find<WH4672> him, before<WH2962> he go up<WH5927> to the high place<WH1116> to eat:<WH398> for<WH3588> the people<WH5971> will not<WH3808> eat<WH398> until<WH5704> he come,<WH935> because<WH3588> he<WH1931> doth bless<WH1288> the sacrifice;<WH2077> and afterwards<WH310> <WH3651> they eat<WH398> that be bidden.<WH7121> Now<WH6258> therefore get you up;<WH5927> for<WH3588> about this time<WH3117> ye shall find<WH4672> him.

And they went up<WH5927> into the city:<WH5892> and when they<WH1992> were come<WH935> into<WH8432> the city,<WH5892> behold,<WH2009> Samuel<WH8050> came out<WH3318> against<WH7125> them, for to go up<WH5927> to the high place.<WH1116>
Now the LORD<WH3068> had told<WH1540> Samuel<WH8050> in<WH854> his ear<WH241> a<WH259> day<WH3117> before<WH6440> Saul<WH7586> came,<WH935> saying,<WH559>

Tomorrow <WH4279> about this time<WH6256> I will send<WH7971> thee a man<WH376> out of the land<WH4480> <WH776> of Benjamin,<WH1144> and thou shalt anoint<WH4886> him to be captain<WH5057> over<WH5921> my people<WH5971> Israel,<WH3478> that he may save<WH3467> <WH853> my people<WH5971> out of the hand<WH4480> <WH3027> of the Philistines:<WH6430> for<WH3588> I have looked upon<WH7200> <WH853> my people,<WH5971> because<WH3588> their cry<WH6818> is come<WH935> unto me.<WH413>

And when Samuel<WH8050> saw<WH7200> <WH853> Saul,<WH7586> the LORD<WH3068> said<WH6030> unto him, Behold<WH2009> the man<WH376> whom<WH834> I spoke<WH559> to<WH413> thee of! this same<WH2088> shall reign<WH6113> over my people.<WH5971>

Then Saul<WH7586> drew near<WH5066> to<WH853> Samuel<WH8050> in<WH8432> the gate,<WH8179> and said,<WH559> Tell<WH5046> me, I pray thee,<WH4994> where<WH335> <WH2088> the seer's<WH7200> house<WH1004> is.

And Samuel<WH8050> answered<WH6030> <WH853> Saul,<WH7586> and said,<WH559> I<WH595> am the seer:<WH7200> go up<WH5927> before<WH6440> me unto the high place;<WH1116> for ye shall eat<WH398> with<WH5973> me today,<WH3117> and tomorrow<WH1242> I will let thee go,<WH7971> and will tell<WH5046> thee all<WH3605> that<WH834> is in thine heart.<WH3824>

And as for thine asses<WH860> that were lost<WH6> three<WH7969> days<WH3117> ago,<WH3117> set<WH7760> not<WH408> <WH853> thy mind<WH3820> on them; for<WH3588> they are found.<WH4672> And on whom<WH4310> is all<WH3605> the desire<WH2532> of Israel?<WH3478> Is it not<WH3808> on thee, and on all<WH3605> thy father's<WH1> house?<WH1004>

And Saul<WH7586> answered<WH6030> and said,<WH559> Am not<WH3808> I<WH595> a Benjamite,<WH1145> of the smallest<WH4480> <WH6996> of the tribes<WH7626> of Israel?<WH3478> and my family<WH4940> the least<WH6810> of all<WH4480> <WH3605> the families<WH4940> of the tribe<WH7626> of Benjamin?<WH1144> wherefore<WH4100> then speakest<WH1696> thou so<WH1697> <WH2088> to<WH413> me?

And Samuel<WH8050> took<WH3947> <WH853> Saul<WH7586> and his servant,<WH5288> and brought<WH935> them into the parlor,<WH3957> and made them sit<WH5414> in the chiefest<WH7218> place<WH4725> among them that were bidden,<WH7121> which<WH1992> were about thirty<WH7970> persons.<WH376>

And Samuel<WH8050> said<WH559> unto the cook,<WH2876> Bring<WH5414> <WH853> the portion<WH4490> which<WH834> I gave<WH5414> thee, of which<WH834> I said<WH559> unto<WH413> thee, Set<WH7760> it by<WH5973> thee.

And the cook<WH2876> took up<WH7311> <WH853> the shoulder,<WH7785> and that which was upon<WH5921> it, and set<WH7760> it before<WH6440> Saul.<WH7586> And Samuel said,<WH559> Behold<WH2009> that which is left!<WH7604> set<WH7760> it before<WH6440> thee, and eat:<WH398> for<WH3588> unto this time<WH4150> hath it been kept<WH8104> for thee since I said,<WH559> I have invited<WH7121> the people.<WH5971> So Saul<WH7586> did eat<WH398> with<WH5973> Samuel<WH8050> that<WH1931> day.<WH3117>
And when they were come down<WH3381> from the high place<WH4480> <WH1116> into the city,<WH5892> Samuel communed<WH1696> with<WH5973> Saul<WH7586> upon<WH5921> the top of the house.<WH1406>

And they arose early:<WH7925> and it came to pass<WH1961> about the spring<WH5927> of the day,<WH7837> that Samuel<WH8050> called<WH7121> <WH413> Saul<WH7586> to the top of the house,<WH1406> saying,<WH559> Up,<WH6965> that I may send thee away.<WH7971> And Saul<WH7586> arose,<WH6965> and they went out<WH3318> both<WH8147> of them, he<WH1931> and Samuel,<WH8050> abroad.<WH2351>

And as they<WH1992> were going down<WH3381> to the end<WH7097> of the city,<WH5892> Samuel<WH8050> said<WH559> to<WH413> Saul,<WH7586> Bid<WH559> the servant<WH5288> pass on<WH5674> before<WH6440> us, (and he passed on,)<WH5674> but stand thou still<WH5975> <WH859> a while,<WH3117> that I may show<WH8085> thee<WH853> the word<WH1697> of God.<WH430>
